project_descr: Enhanced capacity of local government for policy formulation and management

donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
outputs.output_descr:
1. Provincial and local governmnent institutions are strengthened and aligned to implement devolution and related government reforms
2. Access to information is improved for effective decision making, planning & monitoring at provincial and local government levels
3. Mechanisms for participatory local governance are strengthened

project_title: assistance to gove. reforms and practices in balochistan
